Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold Json utility functions.

        Parameters:
        jsonDoc - The json object to check.
        relToFind - The URL to find.
        Returns:
        The requested URL if present, null otherwise.

      • getErrorResponse

        public static ErrorResponse getErrorResponse(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonDoc)
        Extract an error response from the discovery response if any.

        A discovery response has an error if the error field is present.

        Parameters:
        jsonDoc - The discovery response to examine.
        Returns:
        The error response if present, null otherwise.

      • parseJson

                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Parse the string into a Jackson Tree

        Returns a missing node if the string is empty.

        Parameters:
        jsonStr - The Json string to parse.
        Returns:
        The Jackson Json Tree
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • parseOperatorIdentifiedDiscoveryResult

        public static ParsedOperatorIdentifiedDiscoveryResult parseOperatorIdentifiedDiscoveryResult(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonDoc)
        Parse an Operator Identified Discovery Result.

        If the discovery result looks like an Operator Identified result a ParsedOperatorIdentifiedDiscoveryResult is returned.

        Parameters:
        jsonDoc - The discovery result to examine.
        Returns:
        The parsed operator discovery result or null.

      • parseRequestTokenResponse

        public static RequestTokenResponse parseRequestTokenResponse(java.util.Calendar timeReceived,
                                             java.lang.String jsonStr)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Parse the response from a request token call.

        The json is expected to be either an error or a successful request token response.

        Parameters:
        timeReceived - The time the response was received, used to timestamp the returned object.
        jsonStr - The Json string to examine.
        Returns:
        The parsed response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getOptionalStringValue

        static java.lang.String getOptionalStringValue(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode parentNode,
                                      java.lang.String name)
        Return the string value of an optional child node.

        Check the parent node for the named child, if found return the string contents of the child node, return null otherwise.

        Parameters:
        parentNode - The node to check.
        name - Name of the optional child node.
        Returns:
        Text value of child node, if found, null otherwise.
